thanks: Thank you! You will hear from me

data.assignments: Develop a web based controlpanel for large ventilation installations
Technical support on computers and networks, both onsite and as first line support

Developed a web based system which is used to edit and present meeting room availability in the county house.
I also assisted in the implementation of a new wage system. Following the implementation I provided training and support on the system.

Provided assistance in the classroom and after school program.
I also worked about 4 months as a plumber and as a storage worker during this time
Cleaning of classrooms and hallways. 41% employment

data.description: A website that is used to update and showcase an overview of the availability of meeting rooms in the county house in Trondheim. As it was the first time I used PHP it was more of a learning project for me. However the site is still in use today after 2 years.
An Android game for children (available on Play Store)
Serial communication between Raspberry Pi and Arduino. I use this script to play a sound anytime someone connects to this site (yes, this site is hosted on a Raspberry Pi).
This is the site you're looking at right now. It is supposed to showcase my development skills in different areas. It's under development.

data.info: NKI web based studies - This class is needed to be able to attend college and get a higher degree
Self education - I studied independently and signed up for the required exams, while learning how to program and working as an assistant at Åsvang primary school
Brundalen high school - Plumber as elective subject
